DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifies the predefined types of earting element from which the type required may be set.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcEarthingElementTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcEarthingElementTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))
